_instructions.purpose: Products page template with comprehensive product catalog and compatibility matrix
_instructions.usage: Generate dynamic product catalog with categories, detailed product information, and compatibility matrix
_instructions.scalability: Categories can range from 3-15, products per category from 2-20 based on company offerings

meta.title: [PROMPT] Generate SEO title: '{Product Category} Products - {Company} | {Key Product Types}' (max 60 chars)
meta.description: [PROMPT] Write meta description covering main product categories, applications, and quality features (max 160 chars)

hero.title: [PROMPT] Generate products hero title ('Our Products', 'Product Range', 'Quality Products')
hero.subtitle: [PROMPT] Create subtitle describing product quality and applications
hero.backgroundImage: [PROMPT] Product showcase image from Unsplash (search: {industry} products, manufacturing, precision parts, industrial components)

products.title: [PROMPT] Generate products section title ('Product Categories', 'Our Product Range', 'Browse Products')
products.subtitle: [PROMPT] Create subtitle about comprehensive solutions and quality

compatibility.title: [PROMPT] Generate compatibility title ('Product Compatibility Matrix', 'Application Compatibility', 'System Compatibility Guide')
compatibility.subtitle: [PROMPT] Create subtitle about finding right components for specific applications

products.name: [PROMPT] Product category name matching main product categories
products.compatibility: [PROMPT] Array of boolean values indicating compatibility with each application (true/false for each application in order)

cta.title: [PROMPT] Generate product CTA title ('Need Custom Products?', 'Request Quote', 'Custom Solutions Available')
cta.subtitle: [PROMPT] Create subtitle encouraging custom inquiries and technical support

products.allProductsTitle: [PROMPT] Generate all products title ('Complete Product Range', 'All Products', 'Full Catalog')
products.allProductsSubtitle: [PROMPT] Create subtitle about comprehensive offerings and precision
products.categoriesTitle: [PROMPT] Generate categories title ('Product Categories', 'Browse by Category', 'Find Your Products')
products.categoriesSubtitle: [PROMPT] Create subtitle about finding right solutions for specific needs

categories.name: [PROMPT] Category name
categories.description: [PROMPT] Write category description highlighting applications and benefits

products.name: [PROMPT] Product name
products.description: [PROMPT] Write product description focusing on key features and applications
specifications: [PROMPT] Generate 3-6 key specifications (size ranges, materials, standards, pressure ratings, etc.)

products: [PROMPT] Add 2-8 more products per category based on actual product range

categories: [PROMPT] Add 3-12 more categories based on company's product portfolio. Common categories for manufacturing: fittings, valves, components, fasteners, custom parts, assemblies, etc.
